General Batista returns to power in Cuba!

Fulgencio Batista has previously been in power in Cuba. He was running in the Presidential Election this time, but realising he had no chance of winning the election, and with the support of the Army, he staged a coup and re-took power in Cuba.
Fulgencio Batista takes power in Cuba!
